description.value:
Activate 2 (manipulate)

Pulled from the internal reserves of a nodocite experimenter and concentrated into a more potent form, this poison causes intense dizziness in those infected, which in turn induces clumsiness and fatigue.

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:15]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d4[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage and clumsy 1 (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage, clumsy 1, and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Fatigued] (1 round)

publication.title: Starfinder Society Scenario #1-07: Seize and Destroy
